Package commandline

Class BattleCommandLine

java.lang.Object
commandline.BattleCommandLine
public class BattleCommandLine extends Object
Command line interface for choosing battles, running battles, and making player moves.

  • Constructor Summary

    BattleCommandLine()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chooseBattle(GameEnvironment env)
    Command line interface for choosing a battle, the possible battles are displayed, and the player can choose to fight one, or exit to the prievious menu, if a battle is fought and one it is removed from the current battles for this day.
    private boolean
    makeMove(GameEnvironment env, Monster enemy)
    Command line interface to make a move, either attacking (attack strings are displayed and one is chosen), using an item (delegated to InventoryCommandLine), switching the currently active monster in your team, or fleeing the battle.
    boolean
    run(GameEnvironment env, boolean isWildBattle, int teamBattleInd)
    Comman line interface to run a battle, runs pre battle logic, each turn with makeMove() and Player.makeRandomMove() and handles the rewards if the player wins the battle.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleCommandLine

      public BattleCommandLine()

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      private boolean makeMove(GameEnvironment env, Monster enemy)
      Command line interface to make a move, either attacking (attack strings are displayed and one is chosen), using an item (delegated to InventoryCommandLine), switching the currently active monster in your team, or fleeing the battle. The user will be continually prompted for input until a definitive action is taken, as the user may choose to cancel selections.
      Parameters:
      env - GameEnvironment. The game environment.
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster, either the enemy team's active monster or a wild monster.
      Returns:
      boolean. True if the player chose to flee the battle.

    • run

      public boolean run(GameEnvironment env, boolean isWildBattle, int teamBattleInd)
      Comman line interface to run a battle, runs pre battle logic, each turn with makeMove() and Player.makeRandomMove() and handles the rewards if the player wins the battle. If a wild battle is won the player gains the wild monster.
      Parameters:
      env - GameEnvionment. The game environment entity.
      isWildBattle - boolean. Whether or not it is a wild battle being run.
      teamBattleInd - int. The index of the enemy Player in the game environment's battle list.
      Returns:
      boolean. Whether or not the battle was won.

    • chooseBattle

      public void chooseBattle(GameEnvironment env)
      Command line interface for choosing a battle, the possible battles are displayed, and the player can choose to fight one, or exit to the prievious menu, if a battle is fought and one it is removed from the current battles for this day.
      Parameters:
      env - GameEnvironment. The game environment.
